info.name: Saltybet - Hide illuminati text and footer
info.description: Hides the "Get more Salty Bucks!" text under the odds, as well as the entire footer area. Also makes the status text (bets are locked, who won, etc) a bit smaller. Gives more room for the bet list/video/chat, and makes for an overall cleaner look.
info.additionalInfo: Highly recommended if you use the Salty Bettor userscript, as it prevents the chat and video controls from being overlapped.
